title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2169.2 - Grantee audits of recipients
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2169.2 - Grantee audits of recipients

State Regulations

The grantee's financial management system must provide for
audits to be made by the grantee or at its direction and at the expense of the
grantee, of recipients, other than home buyers, with respect to information
related to the program, in accordance with audit guidelines to be prescribed by
the corporation. The corporation will take into account such audit reports in
evaluating the performance of grantees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2169.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
